Bronze 5

What is this?

Bronze 5 is just a personal domain as well as a League of Legends / any ELO-based game joke.

Looking for my my portfolio site?

Looking for my Minecraft server? Send a request along with your Minecraft username to david@bronze5.net or via the below form and I'll get back to you. Already on the whitelist? Connect to minecraft.bronze5.net
